price: Banishyiriyeho ibigirwamana (barabisenga) baretse Allah, kugira ngo bibarinde (ibihano bya Allah) kandi bibaheshe icyubahiro.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum ʿizzan
